paragraphs: Found in the Hearthfire DLC. Italicized sections are filled in by the game.

<italic>While you were away, we came to visit your lovely new house. [Spouse name] made us feel right at home. In fact, we liked [him/her] so much we took [him/her] back to [dungeon name] with us.</italic>
<italic>If you want [Spouse name] back, come see me. Bring [gold amount] gold and I'll discuss letting [him/her] go.</italic>
